backend.physics
Interface MobileGizmoPhysics

All Superinterfaces:
GizmoPhysics, PiecePhysics
All Known Subinterfaces:
MobileGizmo
public interface MobileGizmoPhysics
extends GizmoPhysics

MobileGizmoPhysics - represents a gizmo that is free to move around the playing board but only within a specfied space

Author:
Ragu Vijaykumar
